# <a name="change-your-language-date-and-time-format-or-time-zone-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="cd2de-102">在 Outlook 网页版本中更改语言、日期和时间格式或时区</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd2de-102">Change your language, date and time format, or time zone in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="cd2de-103">在页面顶部, 选择</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd2de-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="cd2de-104">**"设置** > "**查看所有 Outlook 设置**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd2de-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="cd2de-105">选择 "**常规** > **语言和时间**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd2de-105">Select **General** > **Language and time**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="cd2de-106">选择要使用的语言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd2de-106">Select the language you want to use.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="cd2de-107">选择“保存”\*\*\*\*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd2de-107">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="cd2de-108">若要了解详细信息, 请参阅在[web 上的 Outlook 中更改时区和语言设置](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="cd2de-108">To learn more, see [Change the time zone and language settings in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span></span>
